Information.Subtext: Stores the API key used to authenticate access to the endpoint.

Param.Name: idOfTheRowToRefresh
Param.Description: Id of the Row to Refresh

Information.Subtext: Represents detailed cryptocurrency data, including market information, supply metrics, price changes, and rankings for multiple assets.
This is the key used internally by DataMiner to identify the table entries.
Represents name of the Cryptocurrency.
Represents the symbol for the cryptocurrency.

Param.Name: latestListingsOverviewNumberOfMarketPairs
Param.Description: Number of Market Pairs (Latest Listings Overview)

Information.Subtext: Represents the number of unique trading pairs for a cryptocurrency across all exchanges where it is listed.
Represents information about the mineability of the cryptocurrency.
Represents the maximum amount of the cryptocurrency that will ever exist.
Represents the current amount of the cryptocurrency that is publicly available and circulating in the market.
Represents the total amount of the cryptocurrency that currently exists, including coins that are not yet in circulation.
The blockchain platform on which the cryptocurrency runs, if value is 'Native' that means coin is on its own/standalone blockchain.
Represents the rank of the cryptocurrency based on market capitalization on CoinMarketCap.
Represents the current price of the cryptocurrency in USD.
Represents the total value of the cryptocurrency traded in the last 24 hours.
Represents the total value of a cryptocurrency in circulation.
Represents the percentage of the total cryptocurrency market share held by this particular cryptocurrency.

Param.Name: latestListingsOverviewPricePercentageChange24Hours
Param.Description: Price Percentage Change (24 Hours) (Latest Listings Overview)

Information.Subtext: Represents the price change over the past 24 hours (in percentages).

Param.Name: latestListingsOverviewPricePercentangeChange7Days
Param.Description: Price Percentage Change (7 Days) (Latest Listings Overview)

Information.Subtext: Represents the price change over the past 7 days (in percentages).
Represents last timestamp that data was updated.
Represents the timestamp of the last update to the global metrics data.
Represents the percentage dominance of Bitcoin in the overall cryptocurrency market.
Represents the percentage dominance of Ethereum in the overall cryptocurrency market.
Represents the percentage change in Bitcoin's market dominance over the last 24 hours.
Represents the percentage change in Ethereum's market dominance over the last 24 hours.
Title section representing data related to the trading volume and market capitalization.
Represents the total market capitalization of all cryptocurrencies combined.
Represents the total trading volume of all cryptocurrencies in the last 24 hours.
Represents the total market capitalization of all cryptocurrencies as of the previous day.

Param.Name: totalMarketCapYesterdayPercentageChange
Param.Description: Total Market Cap Yesterday Percentage Change

Information.Subtext: Represents the percentage change in the total market capitalization compared to the previous day.
Represents the trading volume in the last 24 hours for DeFi assets, indicating their market liquidity.
Represents the trading volume in the last 24 hours for stablecoins, reflecting their market liquidity.
Represents the market capitalization of all DeFi assets, indicating the total value of the sector.
Represents the market capitalization of all stablecoins, indicating their total value in circulation.
Provides an overview of coin categories with details like name, number of tokens, market cap, and more.
This is the key used internally by DataMiner to identify the table entries.
Represents the name of the coin category.
Indicates the number of tokens available in this coin category.
Represents the average percentage change in price for this coin category.
Indicates the total market capitalization of this coin category in USD.
Indicates the percentage change in market capitalization for this coin category.
Represents the total trading volume of this coin category in USD.
Indicates the percentage change in trading volume for this coin category.
Shows the last time data was updated for this coin category.
Indicates the last time the data refresh action was performed for this coin category overview.
Triggers a manual refresh of the coin category overview data.
The status code for the latest listing response.
The status code for the latest Global Metrics response.
The status code for the latest Categories response.

Param.Name: statusCodeCategoriesOnRowRefresh
Param.Description: Categories Status Code on Row Refresh

Information.Subtext: The status code for the Categories Row Refresh response.
The content of the latest listing response.
The content of the latest Global Metrics response.
The content of the Categories Row Refresh response.

Param.Name: responseContentCategoriesOnRowRefresh
Param.Description: Categories on Row Refresh Response Content

Information.Subtext: The content of the Categories Row Refresh response.

Param.Description: Execute QAction After Latest Listing Data Poll

Param.Name: executeQActionAfterGlobalMetricsDataPoll
Param.Description: Execute QAction After Global Metrics Data Poll

Param.Name: executeQActionAfterCategoriesDataPoll
Param.Description: Execute QAction After Categories Data Poll

Param.Description: Execute QAction After Row Refresh Data Poll
